TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit NeutralResourcesLanguageAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class NeutralResourcesLanguageAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class NeutralResourcesLanguageAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 通知应用程序默认区域性的资源控制器。

span.span: Informs the resource manager of an app's default culture.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## 桌面应用程序Desktop Apps 在桌面应用中，特性通知应用程序的默认区域性的资源管理器和其资源的位置。In desktop apps, the attribute informs the resource manager of an app's default culture and the location of its resources. 默认情况下，资源都嵌入到主应用程序集中，并可以按以下方式使用该属性。By default, resources are embedded in the main app assembly, and you can use the attribute as follows. 此语句指定英语 （美国） 是应用程序的默认区域性。This statement specifies that the English (United States) is the app's default culture. [!code-csharp[System.Resources.NeutralResourcesLanguageAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.resources.neutralresourceslanguageattribute/cs/example1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Resources.NeutralResourcesLanguageAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.resources.neutralresourceslanguageattribute/vb/example1.vb#1)] 你还可以使用特性用于指示在何处可以通过提供查找的默认区域性的资源属性语句中的枚举值。You can also use the attribute to indicate where can find the resources of the default culture by providing an enumeration value in the attribute statement. 这通常是为了指示资源驻留在附属程序集。This is most commonly done to indicate that the resources reside in a satellite assembly. 例如，以下语句指定英语 （美国） 是应用程序的默认或非特定区域性，并且其资源驻留在附属程序集。For example, the following statement specifies that English (United States) is the app's default or neutral culture and that its resources reside in a satellite assembly. 对象将为其查找名为 EN-US 子目录中。The object will look for them in a subdirectory named en-US. [!code-csharp[System.Resources.NeutralResourcesLanguageAttribute#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.resources.neutralresourceslanguageattribute/cs/example2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Resources.NeutralResourcesLanguageAttribute#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.resources.neutralresourceslanguageattribute/vb/example2.vb#2)] > [!TIP] > 我们建议你始终使用属性来定义你的应用程序的默认区域性。We recommend that you always use the attribute to define the default culture of your app. 该属性执行两个角色：The attribute performs two roles: - 如果默认区域性的资源都嵌入到应用程序的主程序集和必须检索属于与默认区域性中，相同的区域性的资源会自动使用改为位于主程序集的资源搜索的附属程序集。If the default culture's resources are embedded in the app's main assembly and has to retrieve resources that belong to the same culture as the default culture, the automatically uses the resources located in the main assembly instead of searching for a satellite assembly. 这将绕过常用的程序集探测，改进加载，且可以缩小工作集的第一个资源的查找性能。This bypasses the usual assembly probe, improves lookup performance for the first resource you load, and can reduce your working set. 请参阅[打包和部署资源](~/docs/framework/resources/packaging-and-deploying-resources-in-desktop-apps.md)进程用来探测资源文件。See [Packaging and Deploying Resources](~/docs/framework/resources/packaging-and-deploying-resources-in-desktop-apps.md) for the process uses to probe for resource files. - 如果默认区域性的资源位于在附属程序集而不是在主应用程序集中，属性指定的区域性和从其运行时可以加载的资源的目录。If the default culture's resources are located in a satellite assembly rather than in the main app assembly, the attribute specifies the culture and the directory from which the runtime can load the resources. ## [!INCLUDE[win8_appname_long](~/includes/win8-appname-long-md.md)] 应用程序 Apps 在[!INCLUDE[win8_appname_long](~/includes/win8-appname-long-md.md)]应用加载和使用检索其资源类，属性定义了非特定区域性发生的失败探测时将使用其资源。In [!INCLUDE[win8_appname_long](~/includes/win8-appname-long-md.md)] apps whose resources are loaded and retrieved by using the class, the attribute defines the neutral culture whose resources are used in the event of a failed probe. 而不指定的资源的位置。It does not specify the location of the resources. 默认情况下，使用应用程序的包资源索引 (PRI) 文件来定位的默认区域性的资源。By default, uses the app's package resource index (PRI) file to locate the resources of the default culture. 非特定区域性定义的属性会被添加到要模拟此效果的 UI 语言列表的末尾。The neutral culture that is defined by the attribute is added to the end of the UI language list to simulate this effect. 如果你加载并通过检索资源[!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)] [Windows.ApplicationModel.Resources.ResourceLoader](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=238182)类或中的类型[Windows.ApplicationModel.Resources.Core](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=238194)命名空间，忽略属性。If you load and retrieve resources by using the [!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)][Windows.ApplicationModel.Resources.ResourceLoader](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=238182) class or the types in the [Windows.ApplicationModel.Resources.Core](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=238194) namespace, the attribute is ignored. ## Examples 下面的示例使用一个简单的"Hello World"应用程序来演示如何使用特性定义默认值或回退区域性。The following example uses a simple "Hello World" app to illustrate the use of the attribute to define a default or fallback culture. 它需要创建单独的资源文件以用于英语 (en)、 简体中文 （中国） (EN-US) 和法语 （法国） (FR-FR) 区域性。It requires the creation of separate resource files for the English (en), English (United States) (en-US), and French (France) (fr-FR) cultures. 下面显示为英语区域性命名 ExampleResources.txt 文本文件的内容。The following shows the contents of a text file named ExampleResources.txt for the English culture. ``` # Resources for the default (en) culture. Greeting=Hello ``` 若要使用应用程序中的资源文件，必须使用以将文件从其文本 (.txt) 格式转换为二进制 (.resources) 文件格式，如下所示：To use the resource file in an app, you must use the to convert the file from its text (.txt) format to a binary (.resources) format as follows: ``` resgen ExampleResources.txt ``` 编译应用程序后，将在主应用程序集中嵌入的二进制资源文件。When the app is compiled, the binary resource file will be embedded in the main app assembly. 下面演示一个名为提供了用于英语 （美国） 区域性资源的 ExampleResources.en US.txt 文本文件的内容。The following shows the contents of a text file named ExampleResources.en-US.txt that provides resources for the English (United States) culture. ``` # Resources for the en-US culture. Greeting=Hi ``` 文本文件可以通过使用转换为二进制资源文件在命令行，如下所示：The text file can be converted to a binary resources file by using the at the command line as follows: ``` resgen ExampleResources.en-US.txt ExampleResources.en-US.resources ``` 二进制资源文件然后应通过使用编译成程序集并通过发出以下命令放入应用程序目录的 EN-US 子目录：The binary resource file should then be compiled into an assembly by using and placed in the en-US subdirectory of the app directory by issuing the following command: ``` al /t:lib /embed:ExampleResources.en-US.resources /culture:en-US /out:en-us\Example.resources.dll ``` 下面演示一个名为提供了用于法语 （法国） 区域性资源的 ExampleResources.fr FR.txt 文本文件的内容。The following shows the contents of a text file named ExampleResources.fr-FR.txt that provides resources for the French (France) culture. ``` # Resources for the fr-FR culture. Greeting=Bonjour ``` 文本文件可以转换为二进制资源文件中，通过在命令行中，如下所示使用 ResGen.exe:The text file can be converted to a binary resource file by using ResGen.exe at the command line as follows: ``` resgen ExampleResources.fr-FR.txt ExampleResources.fr-FR.resources ``` 二进制资源文件然后应通过使用程序集链接器编译成程序集并通过发出以下命令放入应用程序目录的 FR-FR 子目录：The binary resources file should then be compiled into an assembly by using Assembly Linker and placed in the fr-FR subdirectory of the app directory by issuing the following command: ``` al /t:lib /embed:ExampleResources.fr-FR.resources /culture:fr-FR /out:fr-FR\Example.resources.dll ``` 下面的示例提供了可执行代码，将当前区域性设置，将提示输入用户的名称，并显示本地化的字符串。The following example provides the executable code that sets the current culture, prompts for the user's name, and displays a localized string. [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.NeutralResourcesLanguageAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.neutralresourceslanguageattribute/cs/example.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.NeutralResourcesLanguageAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.neutralresourceslanguageattribute/vb/example.vb#1)] 它可以编译使用 Visual Basic 中的以下命令：It can be compiled by using the following command in Visual Basic: ``` vbc Example.vb /resource:ExampleResources.resources ``` 或通过使用以下命令在 C# 中：or by using the following command in C#: ``` csc Example.cs /resource:ExampleResources.resources ```

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 区域性名称的详细列表，请参阅[区域语言支持 (NLS) API 参考](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=200048)转全局开发人员中心。For a detailed list of culture names, see [National Language Support (NLS) API Reference](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=200048) at the Go Global Developer Center.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string cultureName, valuetype System.Resources.UltimateResourceFallbackLocation location) cil managed
Public Sub New (cultureName As String, location As UltimateResourceFallbackLocation)

param.name: cultureName
param.span: 用其编写的当前程序集的非特定语言资源的区域性的名称。

span.span: The name of the culture that the current assembly's neutral resources were written in.

param.name: location
param.span: 枚举值之一，指示检索非特定后备资源的位置。

span.span: One of the enumeration values that indicates the location from which to retrieve neutral fallback resources.

summary.span: 使用指定的最终资源后备位置初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified ultimate resource fallback location.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用具有构造函数枚举来指定是否类是从主应用程序集 （默认值），或由指定的附属程序集检索非特定语言的回退资源与属性。Use the constructor with the enumeration to specify whether the class is to retrieve neutral fallback resources from the main app assembly (the default), or from a satellite assembly specified by the and the properties. 区域性名称的详细列表，请参阅[区域语言支持 (NLS) API 参考](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=200048)转全局开发人员中心。For a detailed list of culture names, see [National Language Support (NLS) API Reference](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=200048) at the Go Global Developer Center.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property CultureName As String
public: property System::String ^ CultureName { System::String ^ get(); };

value.span: 主程序集的默认区域性的名称。

span.span: The name of the default culture for the main assembly.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 区域性名称的详细列表，请参阅[区域语言支持 (NLS) API 参考](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=200048)转全局开发人员中心。For a detailed list of culture names, see [National Language Support (NLS) API Reference](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=200048) at the Go Global Developer Center.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Location As UltimateResourceFallbackLocation

summary.span: 获取 类的位置，该类用于通过[资源回退进程](~/docs/framework/resources/packaging-and-deploying-resources-in-desktop-apps.md)检索非特定语言资源。

span.span: Gets the location for the class to use to retrieve neutral resources by using the [resource fallback process](~/docs/framework/resources/packaging-and-deploying-resources-in-desktop-apps.md).

value.span: 其中一个枚举值，指示要从其检索非特定语言资源的位置（主程序集或附属程序集）。

span.span: One of the enumeration values that indicates the location (main assembly or satellite) from which to retrieve neutral resources.
